trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_00<tab>Novv needs a rock to sink the bloodthirsty ambitions of the Coral Tridents.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_01<tab>Novv has received the alarming news that the Coral Tridents are swarming another merchant vessel. Concerned that this incident will be the catalyst that triggers a full military campaign against the Sahagin, the clutchfather urges you to make haste to the deck of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> to save its crew. Speak with Pahh, the seabeast tamer, and borrow an elbst to carry you across the waves.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_02<tab>After a swift, albeit somewhat wet, journey on the back of the elbst, you pull yourself over the rails of the beleaguered <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>. Speak with the captain of the craft and learn how you might best assist the crew.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_03<tab>The captain of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> bids you take the fight to the Sahagin while his men finish launching the lifeboats. Slay five of the enemies on board and give the captain and his crew the time they need to escape.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_04<tab>You have slain a fistful of the Coral Trident raiders. Return to the captain and check on the crew's progress.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_05<tab>Thanks to your valiant efforts, the entire crew of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> has managed to flee to Aleport in relatively good health. Find the captain in the port town's tavern and learn how he fares.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_06<tab>While recounting the first moments of the attack on his ship, the captain makes mention of the Tridents' supposed leader─a “red-hued sea devil.” Upon overhearing the story, a Maelstrom officer by the name of Ururu Kogururu urges the unhappy trader to recall the specific color. The Lalafellin lieutenant is visibly taken aback at the answer. Ururu goes on to explain that the Scarlet Sea Devil was a particularly savage Sahagin pirate that terrorized the seas of western La Noscea more than fifteen years ago. At the culmination of his chilling tale, the lieutenant departs to report the disturbing revelation to his superior.
Lamenting the loss of his vessel and livelihood, but thankful for his life, the captain of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> gifts you with a sack of oranges he managed to salvage from the hold. Return to Novv's Nursery and share your reward with Novv and the spawnlings.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SEQ_07<tab>After Novv praises you for your actions in saving the crew, you relinquish the sack of oranges to the clutchfather and his curious offspring. The elder Sahagin muses on the differences between your peoples, and provides some insight into the Coral Tridents' rise to prominence. Continue to offer your aid to Novv's Clutch and deepen your understanding of the Sahagin tribe.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Pahh.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the captain of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_02<tab>Defeat Coral Trident raiders aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the captain of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the captain of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> in Aleport.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TODO_05<tab>Share the oranges with Novv at Novv's Nursery.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_000<tab>Pshhh... The tide brings ill news, shhhorewalker. It seems the Coral Tridentsss and their finless pets, the Ssserpent Reavers, are even now ssswarming another vessel off the coast of wessstern La Noscea.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_001<tab>But there is ssstill time─we mussst not let them sink this shhhip as they did the lassst one.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_002<tab>Shhhould the Tridentsss continue to agitate the waters with sssuch abandon, the shhhorewalker elders will shhhurely bring their armies againssst usss.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_003<tab>Shhhorewalker... Pshhh... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is it? I need you to become the rock I ssspoke of when we firssst met. Board the trading vessel known as the <var 1A 02 /var>Ssswallow<var 1A 01 /var> as sssoon as you are able, and blunt the thrusssts of my foolhardy kin.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_004<tab>We Sssahagin are comfortable with ssswimming long distances, but you have not the required...physiology. You mussst speak with my ssson Pahh.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_005<tab>The elbssst he breeds are trained to carry those wounded in deepwater ssskirmishes, but they will just as easily carry an uninjured warrior into battle. Pshhh... Your seabeast sssteed awaits!
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_006<tab>Pshhh... Ssspeak with my ssson Pahh, and he will lend you an elbssst to carry you to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ssswallow<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TAMER01376_000_010<tab>Pshhh... The clutchfather has told me of your need. This elbssst is the largessst and ssswiftest creature in my ssstable, and should have no difficulty in bearing you across the waves.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TAMER01376_000_011<tab>Be shhhure you are prepared for heavy combat, shhhorewalker─the Coral Tridentsss often bring their own ssseabeasts into battle, ill-treated and foul-tempered brutes all. And I ssspeak not of the Ssserpent Reavers, though the description may be apt.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TAMER01376_000_012<tab>Pshhh... Are you ready to ride my elbssst to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ssswallow<var 1A 01 /var>, finless one?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_Q1_000_000<tab>Mount the elbst?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_A1_000_002<tab>No
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TAMER01376_000_013<tab>Pshhh... The tide waitsss for no <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, shhhorewalker. Ssspeak with me again when your preparations are complete.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_Q2_000_000<tab>Return to Novv's Nursery?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_A2_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_A2_000_002<tab>No
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_020<tab>Please! Take whatever you want! Just let me keep my insides on the inside!

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_021<tab>...Eh? You don't work for those marrow-sucking fishbacks? You're here to rescue me and my crew? Well, then! I won't question how you reached us in the middle of the ocean without a vessel of your own...

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_022<tab>Ahem. This proud lady is the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>, and I'm her slightly less-than-proud captain. We were, in fact, in the ignoble process of abandoning ship.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_023<tab>If you truly wish to save our skins, then I would be much obliged if you were to stall the enemies on deck while my men continue to prepare the lifeboats. Stall them how, you ask? Try spilling some of their black blood and see if that helps!

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_024<tab>I'll be supervising things from my, er, “vantage point” here. The deck is swarming with Sahagin and their cronies─pick a victim and set to, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_030<tab>By the Navigator's nightshirt! You certainly are a force of nature! I was so focused on your deadly dance that I scarce noticed the lifeboats were in the water.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_031<tab><sigh> As much as it pains my heart to lose my dear <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>, losing my innards would be more painful still! Come, my brave <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─I can hear the tavern in Aleport calling our names!

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_040<tab>Thank you for your aid, my stalwart friend! If you hadn't inexplicably appeared malms from the coast without a sail in sight, I fear my crew and I would now be taking our final rest on the ocean bed─alongside the broken hull of my sweet <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_041<tab>I had but recently fitted the ship with lifeboats, and I am full glad I did. 'Twas the sinking of that trading ship not long past that prompted me to take such precautions. An awful business, that.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_042<tab>Tell me: how is an honest man meant to make a living when the trade routes are thus preyed upon? How can mere merchants be expected to fight through a sea of slavering fishbacks?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_043<tab>The ones that attacked us were so bold as to <var 1A 02 /var>introduce<var 1A 01 /var> themselves before clambering over our rails. The “Coral Tridents,” they said they were, and praised their leader as some manner of red-hued sea devil─
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_044<tab>(-???-)A <var 1A 02 /var>red-hued<var 1A 01 /var> sea devil!?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_045<tab>...Ah, pray forgive my outburst. Storm Lieutenant Ururu Kogururu, at your service.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_046<tab>Captain─and this is of vital importance─do you recall exactly <var 1A 02 /var>which<var 1A 01 /var> red hue the Sahagin used to describe their leader? It wouldn't happen to have been scarlet...would it?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_047<tab>Well...now that you mention it, I'm fairly certain it <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> scarlet. If it were crimson or carmine, I'm sure I would have remembered. A merchant captain must keep abreast of such details, you underst─
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_048<tab>Twelve above... The demon rises from the depths once more!
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_049<tab>Is something terribly amiss, Lieutenant?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_050<tab>Some fifteen years ago, there was one Sahagin pirate of such cruelty, such depravity, that he plunged the entire region of western La Noscea into gibbering terror.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_051<tab>The hands of the stoutest sailor would shake at the mere hint of his shadow on the waves─truly, he was a monster that froze the hearts of men. Even the Knights of the Barracuda were powerless to halt this villain's rampage.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_052<tab>So much delight did he take in the act of slaughter that the white coral necklace he wore was stained perpetually red with blood. Thus was the beastman whispered of in tavern-room tales as the “Scarlet Sea Devil.”
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_053<tab>'Tis been so long since the name's been uttered, I'd thought him perished of old age. But it appears the horror lives on...
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_URURUKOGURURU_000_054<tab><shudder> These are dark days, my friends. I must return to Camp Skull Valley and report this development to Commander Falkbryda at once!
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_055<tab><gulp> Well, this sea devil fellow sounds awfully unpleasant, doesn't he? Perhaps losing my ship was not the most terrible fortune, after all...
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_056<tab>Ah! I managed to save some things from the hold before we fled. I would be honored if you were to accept a small token of my gratitude.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_057<tab>It is not, alas, a sack bulging with coin. You will, however, find no finer friend than these oranges for fending off illness on long sea voyages.

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_CAPTAIN01376_000_058<tab><sigh> I had carved out a life for myself as an open-sea trader, but I believe it is time I took up a less perilous occupation. Pig farming, mayhap? Hmmm...

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have returned. My ssspawnlings have heard rumors from the Coral Trident camp that the crew of the <var 1A 02 /var>Swallow<var 1A 01 /var> essscaped with the aid of an elbssst-riding shhhorewalker. Pshhhahaha, well done! Though the shhhip was taken, the lives you sssaved will ssspare us much enmity.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_061<tab>Pshhh? What is it you have there...?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_062<tab>Ah, I have ssseen the like of these before. Fruit, yesss? Picked from your land-grown “trees.”
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_INFANTSAHUAGIN01376_000_063<tab>Clutchfather! What are those!? They shhhmell shhhtrange!
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_INFANTSAHUAGIN01376_000_064<tab>“Oh-ren-jez”? Do they tassste as good as sssea cucumbers?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_065<tab>They are a gift from our shhhorewalker friend. Be shhhure to thank <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, and shhhare them evenly among your clutchmatesss.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_INFANTSAHUAGIN01376_000_066<tab>Pshhh! Thank you, shhhorewalker!

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_067<tab>Ssstill ssso innocent. But I cannot shhhelter them from the world's harshhh truths forever. What of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Have you any offssspring?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_068<tab><var 08 E905 ((I imagine a warrior of your ssstature would have much to impart to your hatchlings)) ((I imagine a warrior of your ssstature would have received many eggs from your matriarch)) /var>. Ah, but you shhhorewalkers do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> lay eggs, correct?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_069<tab>Pshhh... There is much I am unfamiliar with concerning your kind, but there is alssso much of <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> people that you likely find mysssterious. For instance, why have the Coral Tridentsss sssuddenly come to prominence?

TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_070<tab>Those who sssucceed in battle are vaunted amongst their kin. And with their ssstrategic use of the Ssserpent Reavers, the Tridentsss have achieved a growing number of victories.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_071<tab>Now you tell me they boassst of a new leader? You are certain of the name?
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_NOVV_000_072<tab>Pshhh... This does not bode well for our plans at all. I did not expect the Ssscarlet Sssea Devil to return...
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Recognized<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with Novv's Clutch.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>New Sahagin society daily quests are now available from Houu at Novv's Nursery.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from the Novv's Clutch vendor.
TEXT_BANSAH003_01376_TAMER01376_000_090<tab>Pshhh... Are you ready to ride my elbssst to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ssswallow<var 1A 01 /var>, finless one?
